message.body: Did mom tell you about grandma blinking the headlights??
No!!! What?!?
(1/2) Apparently the taillights on a trailer mom has was flashing... but theres been no battery in it for a year... no power source. Mom felt the need to call
(2/2) me at work to tell me to be safe driving home
Omg that's so weird!
Well tj fell asleep and totaled his explorer on grandmas road. He is okay but I bet she was def watching over him
He ran into a tree
What?! Did he get hurt at all?
I didnt even think to tell tj to drive safe when mom called...
I'm so glad he's okay
Did he get off late?
(1/2) No he said a little sore from the seatbelt but he said it scared him really bad. He woke up from the impact screaming because he didnt know what happened.
(2/2) Just lots of smoke from the airbags and a loud bang
I think hes exhausted from work, school, dealing w tim, etc
That's so terrifying.
Ugh I'm so glad he's okay.
So much going on in his Life at all times
Yeah me too! Isnt that weird though?! Mom never calls me during work hours. She really felt a strong message
Yeah. Idk how he deals. He needs to get away but he doesnt know any different
How was Paris??
She definitely believes. Is totally weird though. Maybe mom is a psychic!
She should get a show
Psychic Mom
I believe too.... ive seen these weird things happen. Iliana has too over the summer. Moms a medium
Medium mom
Lol. I think that's already a show. Called medium. Paris was good! Oh I wanna call you Tmw Eve and ask you what you remember about the pottero!
Speaking of gramma and pop
Lol. Not much really. Just that it was a weird creepy thi g that lived in the woods and had no butthole so it was super mean
Lolol! Yeah that's what I remember but I was trying to think of when pop told us if we were being bad
But I'm gonna record our conversation for me new animation
And we should go to Paris together you'd love it
I thought about you the whole time!
Id love to go eventually!
Call me tomorrow after 7 or so. Should be a slow night. No soccer
One day!!
Ili got on the travel soccer team
Cool. I wanna hear more about travel soccer too!!!
Yeah I just saw your post!!
Well I think shes w the practice squad for now but so awesome
Drafted!
Okay. Tomorrow. Gn. Love you
Soooo cool
Night!! Love Ya!
